body_html: This is probably a question better suited for stackoverflow. Short version: write_graph only writes the graph, not the variable content. You need a Saver, see for instance: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33689598/how-to-pause-resume-training-in-tensorflow/33690809#33690809
body_text: This is probably a question better suited for stackoverflow. Short version: write_graph only writes the graph, not the variable content. You need a Saver, see for instance:  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33689598/how-to-pause-resume-training-in-tensorflow/33690809#33690809
body: This is probably a question better suited for stackoverflow. Short version: `write_graph` only writes the graph, not the variable content. You need a `Saver`, see for instance:  http://stackoverflow.com/questions/33689598/how-to-pause-resume-training-in-tensorflow/33690809#33690809
